title: Melrose Municipal Schools - 2025-26 District Calendar
text: For Mac OS users, there is a system setting that may not allow you to tab onto several types of elements in a web page. To change this setting: Open System Preferences and go to Keyboard: Select the Shortcuts tab. Make sure the box for "Use keyboard navigation to move focus between controls" is checked. Additional settings for Safari Browser. Open Safari Preferences: Select the Advanced tab. Make sure the box for "Press Tab to highlight each item on a webpage" is checked.
